title: Letter to the editor: Being Hillary to justice
description: Stephen Miller is right: It’s time for the treasonous Hillary Clinton to be prosecuted to the fullest extent of every possible law.
content:
Stephen Miller — and 150 million other free-thinking, non-Clinton-Kool-Aid-drinking, patriotic Americans — are exactly right: It’s time for the treasonous Hillary Clinton to be prosecuted to the fullest extent of every possible law, alongside her anti-American partner and financier George Soros (“White House’s Stephen Miller: Hillary Clinton, Obama officials should be prosecuted for ‘coup,’” Web, Aug. 3).

It’s mind-boggling how billions of Democratic National Committee donors and U.S. taxpayers’ dollars have been intentionally wasted by both Clintons and their minions over the years, surreptitiously manufacturing premeditated false hatred to illegally target their final political opponent, President Donald J. Trump.

Thankfully, new evidence proving that crooked Hillary had wide-reaching control over our entire government, White House, Justice Department, intelligence community — including their various autopens — raises hundreds of other treasonous Clinton conspiracy questions.

What other Clinton-concocted events, hoaxes, fake headlines, judges’ rulings and even plan-demics did Hillary and her global cabal of operatives cook up and try to foist onto the American people, the world and even onto both the Obama and Biden administrations?

What else did she conspire to do and sign off upon: The Jan. 6, 2021, entrapments? The Wuhan-COVID-19 launch? Both Trump impeachments? Every Ivy League campus protest? President JoeBiden’s autopen? Even Butler, PA? Hmmm?

The real question is: Who has the courage to stand up, en masse, to finally rid Washington and the world of all Clinton-Soros political criminality?

Make no mistake: This smoking gun and political bombshell must be widely articulated, posted and shared now, using all remaining non-deep-state media, before the vast “Clinton Broadcasting Service” and “Clinton News Network” bury it.

The bottom line is that anyone in U.S. government, media or legal roles — including everyone in the Trump administration — who remains unwilling to drag the deep state’s highest kingpin before Congress and into court to face justice for each of her treasonous acts ought to “DOGE” themselves now, resign and invest their severance into a lame-duck pickleball club or aGeorgetown cupcake shop.
summary: Stephen Miller and 150 million other patriotic Americans are calling for Hillary Clinton and her allies, George Soros, to be prosecuted for their involvement in a "coup" led by the Clintons and their minions. Miller argues that Clinton had wide-reaching control over our entire government, White House, Justice Department, intelligence community, and billions of dollars have been intentionally wasted by both Clintons. New evidence also raises hundreds of other treasonous Clinton conspiracy questions. Anyone in U.S. government, media or legal roles who are unwilling to prosecute Clinton should resign now, or invest their severance into a pickleball club or a Georgetown cupcake shop.
shortSummary: Stephen Miller advocates for prosecution of Hillary Clinton and George Soros for treason, highlighting the extensive Clinton-Soros political conspiracy.
argos_summary: The article calls for the prosecution of Hillary Clinton and George Soros, accusing them of treason and misuse of power against President Trump. It alleges that Clinton has manipulated various government institutions and events for political gain, raising questions about her involvement in significant incidents like the January 6th events and the COVID-19 pandemic. The author urges the public and officials to take action against what they perceive as deep state corruption.
